name: ifexg
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cif(c0, c2, w0), universe))

stmt.origin: syl2an(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cif(c0, c2, w0), universe), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
stmt.pretty: syl2an(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, if(w0, c0, c2)∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cif(c0, c2, w0), universe))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, universe))
-| wi(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c2, universe))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), wcel(cif(c0, c2, w0), universe))
